column5: I'm thinking of trying the Winnipeg River north of Kenora next June. Any suggestions??? .... Techniques, depths / structure hot spots???
Jump into the "Rough Rock" post, lots of info there & lots of knowledgeable people posting there.Good FishenRob

The Winnipeg River has been good for me the past few years. We like the Big Dalles and North to Minkai. The depths very from 8' to 25'. Current is critical. Bottom bouncers with live bait on 12 to 15' snells.
